products.title: Splash Beige Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. This elegant cream coloured roller blind will make a wonderful addition to any room and will compliment wooden tones thoughout the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Beige - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash beige light filtering skylight blind is a light, natural looking colour for your skylight window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Beige Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Splash beige is an elegant cream colour which will work well with wooden tones throughout the home. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.
